About Me

I'm a passionate web developer focused on building beautiful, accessible, and performant web applications. With expertise in modern frameworks and best practices, I create solutions that make a difference.

Buttons

This component should look familiar if you've ever used shadcn/ui. While you can use shadcn/ui, I prefer not to as there is no need for every component to be a React component.
